document_data.name: Byron Cymrych II
document_data.mainbody: '''Byron Cymrych II''', born '''Merrick Cymrych''',  was High King of the [[Moonshae Isles]] in the late 9{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|33}} He inherited a High Kingship with severely weakened authority and respect owing to the loss of the ''[[Crown of the High King]]'' by [[Dolan Cymrych|his grandfather]].{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|27}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a member of the [[Cymrych Dynasty]] and the first son of his predecessor, High King [[Conn Cymrych]]. His successor was his second son, [[Tanner Cymrych]].
document_data.History:
Byron II assumed the throne of the High King in the {{YearlinkName|885}}, following the death of his father amidst the invasion of the Moonshaes by the [[Northmen]]. He changed his name from "Merrick" to "Byron II" in honor of [[Byron Cymrych I|his great-great-grandfather]]. 

He ruled for seventeen years before dying of [[disease|illness]] in the {{YearlinkName|902}}.
